code: @Override public void setBeanFactory(BeanFactory beanFactory) throws BeansException {     if (beanFactory instanceof ConfigurableListableBeanFactory) {         this.beanFactory = (ConfigurableListableBeanFactory) beanFactory.     } }

@Override public void registerBeanDefinitions(AnnotationMetadata importingClassMetadata, BeanDefinitionRegistry registry) {     if (this.beanFactory == null) {         return.     }     registerSyntheticBeanIfMissing(registry, "webServerFactoryCustomizerBeanPostProcessor", WebServerFactoryCustomizerBeanPostProcessor.class).     registerSyntheticBeanIfMissing(registry, "errorPageRegistrarBeanPostProcessor", ErrorPageRegistrarBeanPostProcessor.class). }

private void registerSyntheticBeanIfMissing(BeanDefinitionRegistry registry, String name, Class<?> beanClass) {     if (ObjectUtils.isEmpty(this.beanFactory.getBeanNamesForType(beanClass, true, false))) {         RootBeanDefinition beanDefinition = new RootBeanDefinition(beanClass).         beanDefinition.setSynthetic(true).         registry.registerBeanDefinition(name, beanDefinition).     } }
